text: Bertrand Lemercier (born 1 March 1968) is a retired French tennis player. Lemercier has a career high ATP singles ranking of 486 achieved on 2 May 1994. He also has a career high doubles ranking of 180 achieved on 26 July 1993. Lemercier has won 1 ATP Challenger doubles title at the 1992 Istanbul Challenger. ==Tour titles== {| class=wikitable |- !
